text: Leopoldo Dante Tévez (known as Leo Dan; March 22, 1942 – January 1, 2025) was an Argentine actor, composer and singer. In 2012, he was honored with the Latin Grammy Lifetime Achievement Award. He appeared in the movies Cómo te extraño (1966) and Story of a Poor Young Man (1968). Dan died on January 1, 2025 in Miami, Florida at the age of 82. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official Page * * Biografia Category:1942 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Argentine composers Category:Argentine singer-songwriters Category:Argentine movie actors
title: Leo Dan
